long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance Your Communication: Tone and Language Transformer for All Websites
Communicate with Confidence on Any Platform

Revolutionize your writing with our powerful extension, now fully compatible with all websites including LinkedIn, Facebook, and Instagram. Break language barriers and tailor your messages for any audience with support for 11 languages: English (U.S. and U.K.), Spanish (Spain and Mexico), French (France and Canada), German, Arabic, Chinese, Japanese, Portuguese (Portugal and Brazil), Italian, Russian, Korean, and Persian.
Smart Tone and Language Customization

Our cutting-edge technology transcends basic grammar checks. It intelligently adjusts the tone and language of your messages, ensuring they are not only accurate but also culturally appropriate and contextually perfect.
Customizable Tone and Language Options:

    Professional
    Friendly
    Informal
    Understanding
    Apologetic
    Assertive
    Humorous
    ...and many more, plus 11 language translations!

Draft your message, choose the perfect tone and language, and let our extension do the rest. Achieve flawless communication tailored to your audienceâ€™s cultural context.
User-Defined Flexibility

With our latest update, you can now define your own tone and effortlessly switch between languages, creating a truly personalized messaging experience.
Premium Features with Global Reach

Experience all features free for 30 days. Post-trial, a subscription is required to continue enjoying the full benefits. Get your license directly from our official website.
Perfect for Diverse Users:

    Business Professionals: Craft messages that exude professionalism and cultural sensitivity.
    Customer Service Representatives: Deliver personalized responses to global customers.
    Multilingual Individuals: Maintain the essence of your message across languages.
    Academics and Students: Submit work or correspond in the required language and tone.
    Remote Teams: Facilitate clear, culturally aware communication across borders.

Upgrade your communication skills with our versatile tool, perfect for anyone aiming to master global interaction.
